body_html: @yf225 One thing to keep in mind when you make these changes is that people use these scripts by hand, so making sure there is also a reasonable user experience when they, e.g., want to run the test by hand is a good idea.
body_text: @yf225 One thing to keep in mind when you make these changes is that people use these scripts by hand, so making sure there is also a reasonable user experience when they, e.g., want to run the test by hand is a good idea.
body: @yf225 One thing to keep in mind when you make these changes is that people use these scripts by hand, so making sure there is also a reasonable user experience when they, e.g., want to run the test by hand is a good idea.
